name: WWE 2K23: Revel with Wyatt Pack
summary: The Revel with Wyatt Pack includes the franchise return of Bray Wyatt, along with Zeus, Valhalla, Joe Gacy, Blair Davenport & bonus Superstar, Uncle Howdy. Each playable Superstar comes with their own MyFACTION card. The Revel with Wyatt Pack is included with the WWE 2K23 Season Pass.
